pullRequest.title: Add ``mod`` alias for the ``modulus`` scalar function
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also adds missing documentation and tests for the modulus scalar function.
Supersedes #9637 (We could backport the dedicated commit later on if wanted).

nodes.bodyText:
lgtm
just a side note, this function is also registered for interval and timestamp types. not sure if it makes sense.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -109,15 +110,20 @@ public static void register(ScalarFunctionModule module) {
             (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 / arg1,
             (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 / arg1
         ));
-        module.register(Names.MODULUS, new ArithmeticFunctionResolver(
-            Names.MODULUS,
-            "%",
-            FunctionInfo.DETERMINISTIC_ONLY,
-            (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1,
-            (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1,
-            (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1,
-            (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1
-        ));
+
+        java.util.function.Function<String, ArithmeticFunctionResolver> modFunctionResolverFactory =
+            name -> new ArithmeticFunctionResolver(
+                name,
+                "%",
+                FunctionInfo.DETERMINISTIC_ONLY,
+                (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1,
+                (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1,
+                (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1,
+                (arg0, arg1) -> arg0 % arg1
+            );
+
+        module.register(Names.MODULUS, modFunctionResolverFactory.apply(Names.MODULUS));

commit.message: Add missing documentation and tests for the ``modulus`` scalar.
Add ``mod`` alias for the ``modulus`` scalar function

beforeCommit.message: Add ``mod`` alias for the ``modulus`` scalar function

afterCommit.message: Add ``mod`` alias for the ``modulus`` scalar function
